column5: Casa Alteza is a fabulous Mid Century Modern home set in the wooded hills above downtown Austin. Enjoy the peace and privacy with nature surrounding and views of stunning sunsets- minutes from the action of downtown Austin.   The home is split level with 2 guest rooms upstairs and the master bedroom on the main level. A great setup for families and vacationing couples, allowing for space and privacy. Two of the bedrooms have their own private balconies with commanding views.
